title: scalar=rank 0 tensor, vector=rank 1 tensor 係咪誤解？

replies.msg:
我見網上researchgate, stackexchange 都話scalar係rank 0 tensor, vector就Rank 1 tensor
Tensor係generalisation of vector
其實觀念上係咪有錯
因為無論scalar 定vector本身都係invariants
都係Independent of coordinate systems 嘅geometric objects
兩者都應該係Tensor of Rank 0
做座標變換唔需要乘jacobian matrix
反而係(covariant/contravariant) components of vector先係tensor of rank 1
因為做座標變換要乘一次jacobian

即係話components of vector wrt some coordinate basis 先係tensor of rank 1
Vector個object本身係Rank 0
我以前一直將tensor理解成某啲invariant 嘅geometric object
只係比vector更General
但似乎只有表述方式先係higher order tensor?

Scalar=quantity preserved under coordinate transformation
但其實vector都符合呢個定義？
因為vector喺座標變換下只係改變對應coordinate basis嘅表述方式
變嘅係covariant/ contravariant components
而唔係vector本身？
咁tensor都只係一個multi linear map啫

另外似乎physics入面對tensor 嘅界定都好求其？求其一個S_ij=partial d T_i/partial d x_j都叫一個tensor
但Partial derivative of tensor in general 唔係tensor
